Translations.Text: Ini: "tusa d tidep, ur d nezzunt tkerkas, ur d ppalsent
Ini: "ma nnetlafe$, nnetlafe$ kan i iman iw. Ma pwanha$, d ayen iyi d Iweeea Mass iw. Neppa, ih, d Aqoib, Isell
Lemmer a pwaliv mi xelaan, tarewla ur telli. Pwaiifen, si tama iqeoben
Nnan: "numen yis". Amek ara d ssiwven, si tama ibaaden
Ni$ llan zik, nekoen t. Rran akin tabavnit, si tama ibaaden
Ad yili ufuil, garasen d wayen ctaqen, akken tevoa, zik, d wid i ten icban. Ih, nitni llan di ccekk imcebbwel
Ccekoan i Oebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, i Irran lmalayek d timersulin sut sin, krav, akked kue iferrawen. Irennu, di lxelq, ayen i S ihwan. Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci
Ayen Ifka Oebbi ueunu, i medden, ur t itekkes yiwen. Ayen Iiief, ur izmir yiwen a t id iazen, deffir eS. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
A yimdanen! Mmektit ed a$iti nnwen s$uo Oebbi. Day illa uxellaq, war Oebbi, ikwen ioeeqen seg igenni akked tmurt? Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, ihi acimi tessaawajem
